name: Twinstick Asset Package Demo
description:
(Gamepad required atm!)
100% supported: Dualshock 4 v1 and v2.
Unknowned but may still work: Xbox 360, Xbox one.

Hello guys! This is basicly an very early prototype of a twinstick shooter asset pack that I am going to release for the assetstore. The idea is to make it as easy as possible for the user to just drag and drop in the models he/she made, put on a gun script and then I have taken care of the rest ;)

This does actually work right now. You can make cool new guns within 1 minute where you can choose from shotgun, bazooka, rapidfire or singleshot. There will ofcourse be a custom gun mode were the user can change manually how the bullets are going to travel, animations, sounds and alot more!

The package will be 5$, so yea, it will be pretty cheap. The reason is because I've never done an asset package before and do not classify myself as an professional game developer.

So here is a little sneak peak on what I've worked on this weekend!
Enjoy!

(KEEP IN MIND THIS HAS ONLY BEEN WORKED ON FOR 3-4 DAYS AND IS A VERY EARLY LITTLE PROTOTYPE, THANK YOU).
